sentences.en: Cartons of Chinese food were arrayed on a large oak table.
sentences.cn: 在一张宽大的橡树桌上摆放着一盒盒中式食品。

sentences.en: Five cows graze serenely around a massive oak.
sentences.cn: 5头奶牛在一棵大橡树旁悠闲自在地啃着青草。

sentences.en: He was a huge man, built like an oak tree.
sentences.cn: 他是个大块头，结实得像棵橡树。

sentences.en: I have seen bricks amid the oak copse there.
sentences.cn: 我还看见过橡树林中留存着的砖头。

sentences.en: Quietly he walked towards her, past her, and on towards the heavy oak door.
sentences.cn: 轻轻地，他走向她，慢慢地，走过去，走向那沉重的橡树门。

sentences.en: The architect specified oak for the wood trim.
sentences.cn: 那位建筑师指定用橡木做木饰条.

sentences.en: The cabinet was made of oak.
The chair is of solid oak.
The drawing room is particularly notable for its splendid oak panelling.
sentences.cn: 客厅富丽堂皇的橡木镶板特别引人注目.

sentences.en: the knotty roots of the old oak tree
The oak is implicit in the acorn.
The rooms have a baronial feel, with oak paneling and leather sofas.
sentences.cn: 橡木制镶板和皮沙发使房间看起来既豪华气派又古色古香。
这几堵墙装的是橡木护墙板。

sentences.en: The wind was bouncing the branches of the big oak trees.
sentences.cn: 一棵棵高大橡树的枝条随风摇摆。

sentences.en: We chopped down an oak tree.
We could hear the oak riving and splitting under the machine - gun fire.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到在机枪射击下橡树被击裂的声音.

phrases.phrase: great oaks from little acorns grow
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)小小橡实可能长成参天大树
橡树岭（美国田纳西州东部城市）
(英)（某些大学中）闭门谢客（指将房门关住表示希望免受打扰）

trans.tran_cn: 栎树，橡木色，栎木，橡木，橡木家具
trans.tran_en: a large tree that is common in northern countries, or the hard wood of this tree
